includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: US superhero drama from the creators of Arrow. Meet Barry Allen, a CSI investigator who suddenly develops a need for speed.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: US superhero drama from the creators of Arrow. Meet Barry Allen, a CSI investigator who suddenly develops a need for speed.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: US superhero drama from the creators of Arrow. Meet Barry Allen, a CSI investigator who suddenly develops a need for speed.

includedAssets.title: Fastest Man Alive
includedAssets.synopsis: Getting to grips with life in the fast lane, Barry confronts a robber who can make multiple versions of himself.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Getting to grips with life in the fast lane, Barry confronts a robber who can make multiple versions of himself.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Getting to grips with life in the fast lane, Barry confronts a robber who can make multiple versions of himself.

includedAssets.title: Things You Can't Outrun
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep3 - Things You Can't Outrun
includedAssets.synopsis: The Flash may have met his match in a metahuman who can transform into a deadly poisonous gas.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Flash may have met his match in a metahuman who can transform into a deadly poisonous gas.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Flash may have met his match in a metahuman who can transform into a deadly poisonous gas.

includedAssets.title: Going Rogue
includedAssets.synopsis: Temperatures drop when The Flash confronts a diamond thief armed with a deep-freeze gun. Wentworth Miller guest stars.

includedAssets.title: Plastique
includedAssets.synopsis: Barry and the team uncover a conspiracy when the army rolls into town to investigate a bomb explosion.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Barry and the team uncover a conspiracy when the army rolls into town to investigate a bomb explosion.

includedAssets.title: Flash Is Born
includedAssets.synopsis: A muscly metahuman who can transform into metal wreaks havoc in Central City. Joe, meanwhile, reaches out to Dr Wells.

includedAssets.title: Power Outage
includedAssets.synopsis: Alarm bells ring when The Flash is zapped by a metahuman who can harness electricity. A familiar foe stops by, too.

includedAssets.title: The Man in the Yellow Suit
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep9 - The Man in the Yellow Suit
includedAssets.synopsis: An angst-filled Christmas is in store for Barry when he's confronted by the man who killed his mother.

includedAssets.synopsis: Romance bubbles between Barry and a sports reporter, before a run-in with a metahuman who has teleportation powers.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Romance bubbles between Barry and a sports reporter, before a run-in with a metahuman who has teleportation powers.

includedAssets.title: The Nuclear Man

includedAssets.title: The Trap
includedAssets.synopsis: Pressure mounts as Barry and co set a trap to catch Wells - using Cisco as bait. Will the risky move pay off?

includedAssets.title: Fast Enough
includedAssets.synopsis: A life-changing decision is on the cards for Barry in the spectacular season finale when he battles nemesis Dr Wells.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: After being struck by a bolt of lightning Barry Allen gains the power to move at incredible speeds, becoming crime-fighting hero The Flash. Grant Gustin is DC Comics’ fastest man alive in this hit adaptation.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After being struck by lightning Barry Allen gains super speed, becoming crime-fighter The Flash. Grant Gustin stars as DC Comics’ fastest man alive.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After being struck by a bolt of lightning Barry Allen gains the power to move at incredible speeds, becoming crime-fighting hero The Flash. Grant Gustin is DC Comics’ fastest man alive in this hit adaptation.

includedIn.title: The Flash
includedIn.synopsis: After being struck by a bolt of lightning and doused in chemicals, Barry Allen gains the power to move at incredible speeds, becoming crime-fighting hero The Flash.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: After being struck by a bolt of lightning Barry Allen gains the power to move at incredible speeds, becoming crime-fighting hero The Flash.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: After being struck by a bolt of lightning and doused in chemicals, Barry Allen gains the power to move at incredible speeds, becoming crime-fighting hero The Flash.
